articles.title: Golden State Warriors win NBA title with Game 6 victory over Boston Celtics
articles.description: Led by 34 points from Stephen Curry, the Golden State Warriors defeated the Boston Celtics 103-90 on Thursday night to claim their fourth NBA championship in the last eight seasons.
articles.content:

articles.title: Hear why a constitutional law expert thinks Trump is guilty 'without any doubt' - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Erin Burnett talks to Harvard constitutional law Professor Laurence Tribe about the charges former President Donald Trump could face after the House January 6 committee makes its case.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: The 16 most compelling lines from today's January 6 committee hearing
articles.description: The third public hearing of the January 6 committee this month is in the books. It was heavily focused on the pressure campaign that Donald Trump brought to bear on Mike Pence to overturn the Electoral College results in advance of January 6, 2021.

articles.author: Shawna Mizelle and Tierney Sneed, CNN
articles.title: Jan. 6 panel sends request to Ginni Thomas after she says she looks 'forward to talking'
articles.description: House January 6 committee Chair Bennie Thompson on Thursday said the panel investigating the US Capitol attack has sent a letter to Virginia "Ginni" Thomas asking her to speak with them about her role in the effort to overturn the 2020 electoral results.

articles.title: Ivanka describes 'heated' phone call between Pence and Trump  - CNN Video
articles.description: The House select committee investigating the January 6 Capitol riot presents a pre-produced compilation of key Trump allies recounting a "heated" phone call between former President Trump and former Vice President Pence.

articles.title: Watch: See how close rioters got to Pence as they breached the Capitol - CNN Video
articles.description: In video animations showing the movement of former Vice President Mike Pence, the House select committee investigating January 6 revealed how close rioters got to Pence at one point after they entered the Capitol.
